rules.project_description: A project that uses NextJS 15 and OpenAI's Assistants API to provide instant, accurate, and actionable insights for behavioral health facilities.

coding_guidelines.openai: Always reference current OpenAI documentation before writing new code, especially with regards to the Assistant API (v2 beta).
coding_guidelines.refactoring: When refactoring always consider the source of truth hierarchy: 1) supabase table schema, 2) type definitions, 3) zustand state store
